message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "MATH" using a Caesar Cipher with a shift of 3. What would be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATH" using a Caesar Cipher with a shift of 3, you would shift each letter in the message 3 positions forward in the alphabet. If the shift goes beyond 'Z', it wraps around to the beginning of the alphabet.

M -> P
A -> D
T -> W
H -> K

So, the encrypted message would be "PDWK".
